mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AT_SYS_MENU( M_TITLE, M_DESC, PARENT_ID, TFLAG, INID, IS_SYSTEM, CATEGORY, IS_ENDNODE, SHOW_INDEX, REMARK ) VALUES( #{mtitle}, #{mdesc}, #{parentId}, #{tflag}, #{inid}, #{idSystem}, #{category}, #{isEndnode}, #{showIndex}, #{remark} )
mapper.select: SELECT ID as id, M_TITLE as mtitle, M_DESC as mdesc, PARENT_ID as parentId, TFLAG as tflag, INID as inid, IS_SYSTEM as isSystem, CATEGORY as category, IS_ENDNODE as isEndnode, SHOW_INDEX as showIndex, CREATE_TIME as createTime, UPDATE_TIME as updateTime, REMARK as remark FROM AT_SYS_MENU WHERE ID=#{id}

select ID as id, M_TITLE as mtitle, M_DESC as mdesc, PARENT_ID as parentId, TFLAG as tflag, INID as inid, IS_SYSTEM as isSystem, CATEGORY as category, IS_ENDNODE as isEndnode, SHOW_INDEX as showIndex, CREATE_TIME as createTime, UPDATE_TIME as updateTime, REMARK as remark from AT_SYS_MENU m where EXISTS ( select TREE_ID from AT_SYS_MODEL l where EXISTS ( select DISTINCT MENU_CODE from AT_HOLD_FUNCTION f where f.ACTOR_ID = #{userId} and f.MENU_CODE = l.MENU_CODE ) and m.ID = l.TREE_ID )
